text: Fordham University is a private research university in New York City, New York. The university has about 14,544 students. It was founded in 1841. The current president of the university is Reverend Joseph M. McShane S.J. ==Sports== The athletics teams of the university are called the Rams. They have 22 varsity teams and they compete in the Atlantic 10 Conference for everything but football. In football Fordham competes in the Patriot League. ==Other websites== *Fordham University's Official website *Fordham Rams' Official website Category:Association of Jesuit Colleges and Universities Category:Atlantic 10 Conference Category:Colleges and universities in New York City Category:1841 establishments in the United States Category:1840s establishments in New York (state)
title: Fordham University
